entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:03 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 5:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 7.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: 4.3°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near noon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 50 gusting to 80 before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016
